reasoning: VSD is the most common congenital heart defect, affecting ~1.2 per 1000 live births globally (120 per 100k births). Reporting birth incidence. Data from major cardiac registries and WHO epidemiological surveys.
source: Hoffman JI, Kaplan S. (2002). The incidence of congenital heart disease. J Am Coll Cardiol. 39(12):1890-1900
